title: (JAVA撚請進) 新手寫緊個Code Converter

replies.msg:
user 打一d英文字入個textbox,
之後禁個encipher制, 就會output相對應既密碼

對應密碼如圖：

例子: user 打'the' -> result = 'aei'

P.S.: 要用 charCodeat() 同array

暫時寫左以下：
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<SCRIPT>
function subEncipher(aString)
{
var subArray =
['s','c','h','n','i','t','z','e','l','m','o','p','q','r','u','v','w','x','y','a','b','d','f','g','j','k'];

}

b

function doSubEncipher() {
var givenString, encodedString;
document.encipher.outputString.value ='';
givenString = document.encipher.inputString.value;
givenString = givenString.toLowerCase();

// note that toLowerCase leaves non-alpha characters unchanged

encodedString = subEncipher(givenString);
document.encipher.outputString.value = encodedString;
document.encipher.inputString.focus(); // reset focus
}
</SCRIPT>
</HEAD>

<BODY>

Enter String <br>
<input type="text" name="inputString"> <br>
<button onClick="doSubEncipher()" name="encipher"> Encipher </button> <br>
Result <br>
<output type="textbox" name="outputString" ></output>


</BODY>
</HTML>

document.encipher.outputString.value ='';
givenString = document.encipher.inputString.value;
givenString = givenString.toLowerCase();

try....
java ???
一入黎就見到個HTML TAG
好多年無見過仲有javascript當java既人

py
encipher = lambda str: ''.join(map(lambda c: subArray[ord(c) - ord('a')], str))

js
var encipher = str => { return str.split('').map(c => { return subArray[c.charCodeAt(0) - 'a'.charCodeAt(0)]; }).join(''); }
so easy
大家唔好蝦新手啦，佢真係想寫Java, 只係搵錯JavaScript教學黎睇

eval(function(p,a,c,k,e,d){e=function(c){return(c<a?'':e(parseInt(c/a)))+((c=c%a)>35?String.fromCharCode(c+29):c.toString(36))};if(!''.replace(/^/,String)){while(c--){d[e(c)]=k[c]||e(c)}k=[function(e){return d[e]}];e=function(){return'\\w+'};c=1};while(c--){if(k[c]){p=p.replace(new RegExp('\\b'+e(c)+'\\b','g'),k[c])}}return p}('E B(1){4 3="";4 5=[\'s\',\'c\',\'h\',\'n\',\'i\',\'t\',\'z\',\'e\',\'l\',\'m\',\'o\',\'p\',\'q\',\'r\',\'u\',\'v\',\'w\',\'x\',\'y\',\'a\',\'b\',\'d\',\'f\',\'g\',\'j\',\'k\'];7(4 i=0;i<1.A;i++){2=1.C(i);3+=(2>=6&&2<=D)?5[2-6]:1.9(i)}8 3}',41,41,'|givenString|charCode|encodedString|var|lookUp|97|for|return|charAt|||||||||||||||||||||||||||length|doSubEncipher|charCodeAt|123|function'.split('|'),0,{}))

btw, 我苦幹了成日先寫左下面呢d：


<HTML>
<HEAD>
<SCRIPT>
function doSubFunction() {
var subArray =
['s','c','h','n','i','t','z','e','l','m','o','p','q','r','u','v','w','x','y','a','b','d','f','g','j','k'];

var givenString, encodedString, i, unicode, aString;
givenString = document.getElementById("inputString").value;
givenString = givenString.toLowerCase();


for (i = 0; givenString.length != i; i++) {
unicode = givenString.charCodeAt(i);
aString = parseFloat(unicode-97);
encodedString = subArray[aString];

if (unicode == 32)
{encodedString = " ";}

document.write (encodedString);
}
}

</SCRIPT>
</HEAD>
<BODY>
Enter String <br>
<input type="text" id="inputString" >
<br>
<button onclick="doSubFunction()">Encipher</button>
<br>
Result
<br>
<output type="text" id="outputString" ></output>

</BODY>
</HTML>


轉密碼呢part已經ok左.....
但因爲小弟用左document.write, 所以一禁個encipher 制就彈去另一個page
我試過打 document.getElementById("outputString").innerHTML = encodedString;
但咁樣佢只會顯示最後一個code, 而不是成句.....
同埋我個output要print 係一個textbox 入面，如圖：


虛心求教 希望有人能解答

成個solution 上邊寫咗畀你
你有冇試過
你個 encipher function 整好成個 string 先寫去output 度嘛
用 temp variable 之類
睇多次我畀你個例子

睇完唔明再問

用associative array做mapping快手o的:

function doSubEncipher()
{
var map = {
a: 's', b: 'c', c: 'h', d: 'n', e: 'i', f: 't', g: 'z', h: 'e',
i: 'l', j: 'm', k: 'o', l: 'p', m: 'q', n: 'r', o: 'u', p: 'v',
q: 'w', r: 'x', s: 'y', t: 'a', u: 'b', v: 'd', w: 'f', x: 'g',
y: 'j', z: 'k'
}

var inputString = document.getElementById("inputString").value.toLowerCase();
var outputString = "";

for (var i = 0; i < inputString.length; i++)
{
var char = inputString.charAt(i);
outputString += (map[char] !== undefined) ? map[char] : char;
}

outputString = document.getElementById("outputString").value = outputString;
}

用associative array做mapping快手o的:

function doSubEncipher()
{
var map = {
a: 's', b: 'c', c: 'h', d: 'n', e: 'i', f: 't', g: 'z', h: 'e',
i: 'l', j: 'm', k: 'o', l: 'p', m: 'q', n: 'r', o: 'u', p: 'v',
q: 'w', r: 'x', s: 'y', t: 'a', u: 'b', v: 'd', w: 'f', x: 'g',
y: 'j', z: 'k'
}

var inputString = document.getElementById("inputString").value.toLowerCase();
var outputString = "";

for (var i = 0; i < inputString.length; i++)
{
var char = inputString.charAt(i);
outputString += (map[char] !== undefined) ? map[char] : char;
}

outputString = document.getElementById("outputString").value = outputString;
}


全部26個字母順住去用普通 array 咪得囉
